name: US Dairy Export Council
legal: non-profit organisation - registered as a 501 (c)(6) in the US
goal: USDEC is a non-profit, independent membership organization that represents the export trade interests of U.S. milk producers and its member proprietary processors, dairy cooperatives, and export traders. The Councilâ€™s mission is to build global demand for U.S. dairy products and assist the industry in increasing the volume and value of exports.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Customs, Food Safety, Trade
